csw:Record.dc:title: Water Bodies: global monthly (raster 300m) - version 2, Dec 2020
csw:Record.dc:subject: Orthoimagery
water body
SURFACE WATER
GLOBE
Dekad
27 days, 0:00:00 composite
imageryBaseMapsEarthCover
inlandWaters
environment
csw:Record.dct:abstract: The Water Bodies product detects the areas covered by inland water along the year providing the maximum and the minimum extent of the water surface as well as the seasonal dynamics. The area of water bodies is identified as an Essential Climate Variable (ECV) by the Global Climate Observing System (GCOS).
csw:Record.dc:description: The Water Bodies product detects the areas covered by inland water along the year providing the maximum and the minimum extent of the water surface as well as the seasonal dynamics. The area of water bodies is identified as an Essential Climate Variable (ECV) by the Global Climate Observing System (GCOS).
csw:Record.dc:source: The input data are the 27 days, 0:00:00 Top measured by the MSI sensor.
